src:
Fiscal José Luis Perez Calaf no será el encargado de investigar querella contra Piñera
El viernes se dará a conocer al persecutor encargado.
07 Nov 2019 by Diego Álvarez
A pesar de lo que se había informado en un comienzo, la Fiscalía Nacional informó que el persecutor regional metropolitano oriente, José Luis Pérez Calaf, no asumirá la investigación de la querella presentada contra el Presidente Sebastián Piñera.Previo a que se dictase la resolución de nombramiento, el fiscal hizo presente como inhabilidad el hecho de que un abogado de su Fiscalía Regional trabajó antes con Juan Domingo Acosta.Dicho profesional había trabajado con el Presidente Piñera en el pasado, por lo que el Fiscal Nacional, Jorge Abbott, definirá el viernes al encargado de la investigación.
text:
Prosecutor José Luis Perez Calaf will not be responsible for investigating a complaint against Piñera
On Friday the persecutor in charge will be announced.
07 Nov 2019 by Diego Álvarez
Despite what had been reported in the beginning, the National Prosecutor's Office informed that the eastern metropolitan regional persecutor, José Luis Pérez Calaf, will not assume the investigation of the complaint filed against President Sebastián Piñera. Appointment, the prosecutor presented as an inability the fact that a lawyer from his Regional Prosecutor previously worked with Juan Domingo Acosta. This professional had worked with President Piñera in the past, so the National Prosecutor, Jorge Abbott, will define Friday To the person in charge of the investigation.
